about_the_game:
In this 2D action game, you control a vampire stuck in tables. Your character gets new swords and spells while gaining experience and leveling up by defeating enemies. By exploring randomly generated dungeons, he fights powerful enemies and reaches new enemies and territories using teleportation points. An immersive story and excellent gameplay are waiting for you.

increase Your Strength

Gain experience by defeating enemies and raise your level. As you level up, learn new abilities and powerful spells, get better swords and equipment. Overcome difficulties by developing your character.

explore the Dungeons

Explore randomly generated dungeons and experience different adventures every time. Face powerful enemies and earn valuable loot by defeating them. quickly reach new areas using teleportation points, find and confront the main enemy of each region and speed up your adventure.

fight With Enemies

Fight the hordes of enemies that come up against you, win using your skills and strategies. Get stronger in every battle and defeat every enemy you encounter.

discover the Mysterious Spells

Discover new spells by spending experience points. Use these spells to gain the upper hand against your enemies and increase your chances of survival in the dungeons. Each new spell will add freshness to your game.

Let your vampire character stuck in the paintings get out of this dark world. End of the dungeon Fight enemies, get weapons and friends, and defeat your enemies with powers and spells taken from the special ability tree. This exciting adventure is waiting for you!
